## {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

### Average increase per day (over 7 days)
```{r opencovid_avg}
DailyFig(keys = c("Average increase per day (Toronto)"),
         tab = "opencovid.ca", 
         rug = FALSE, 
         caption = "Data source: opencovid.ca/api/")
```

### Cumulative cases
```{r opencovid_total}
LocalFig(keys = c("Total cases (Toronto)"),

         rug = FALSE, 
         caption = "Data source: opencovid.ca/api/")
```

### Deaths
